Text.Page:
! My puppy is gone!
I didn't want to take my medicine so I threw my doll far away...

My puppy went to fetch the doll and didn't come back...

I got mad when they made me take that medicine, and I threw my doll way over there.

My dog Stinky thought I was playing, and he ran after it. This is all my fault...!

Stinky usually comes running back when I blow this whistle but he won't...

I'm really scared for him.

I want to go find him, but Mom and Dad won't let me go.
(This must be Ameldas's doll. There are rags scattered all over the place. Perhaps the dog tore the doll apart?)

Woof!

(The dog seems happy to see the doll.)"There you are. Let's get you home."

Woof! Woof!

(The dog wags his tail.)

You brought him back!

Thank you so much, !

But...did you find my doll?"I think this is your doll."

What? Did Stinky do that?

Is that why he didn't come back?

Oh, Stinky! I'm so sorry!

No! I won't cry.
I'm going to be good from now on!
I'm just glad you came back.

What am I going to do with my doll now...?
Did you find my doll, too?
